coockieMain.title: Coockie Policy
coockieMain.desc: We use cookies to ensure the smooth operation of the website (essential cookies) and to create services and offers tailored to your needs (optional cookies – you need to agree to them additionally). You can change your device settings yourself. More information in the Privacy Policy.

required.requiredDesc: These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of our online store. Thanks to them, we can securely fulfill your order, remember you as a registered User if you navigate to another page, or automatically fill in your address data during the ordering process. Blocking these cookies in your browser may cause the website to malfunction.

analithics.analithicsDesc: Analytical cookies allow us to understand how you use our online store, point out pages that need improvement or that perform their function correctly and are popular. It is important to note that the information collected is anonymous and we cannot identify the user based on it.

personalization.personalizationDesc: By agreeing to the use of these cookies, you allow us to tailor advertisements to your interests. With their help, our partner platforms, such as Facebook or Instagram, will be able to properly customize the displayed content so that it is useful and relevant for you.

advertisment.advertismentDesc: By agreeing to the use of these cookies, you allow us to tailor advertisements to your interests. With their help, our partner platforms, such as Facebook or Instagram, will be able to properly customize the displayed content so that it is useful and relevant for you.

wpPost.title: ORGATEC INTERNATIONAL EXHIBITION IN GERMANY
wpPost.content:
Friends, we are pleased to inform you that on October 25-29 you will be able to find us at the ORGATEC exhibition in Cologne (Germany)
ORGATEC is one of the world’s largest exhibitions on the organization of a modern workspace. And we are the ONLY company from Ukraine that is represented there. We are proud of the fact that we will be ambassadors of Ukraine in the world of ergonomic solutionsüòé And we are already at the finish line with the development of two completely new models that we will present to the general public.
We are constantly working on improving our own developments and, of course, creating NEW ones! After all, our goal is to make your life easier, to create healthy and comfortable working conditions, where every detail is taken into account, every function is thought out. Working in such a workspace, your body will say “Thank you!”

We will be extremely glad to meet ours! We invite you!
October 25-29, 2022
üìçFair location: Koelnmesse, Messeplatz 1)

–ó–≥—ñ–¥–Ω–æ –¥–æ—Å–ª—ñ–¥–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—è* –≤–∂–µ –ø—ñ—Å–ª—è 2 —Ç–∏–∂–Ω—ñ–≤ –≤–∏–∫–æ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—è –ø—ñ–¥–π–æ–º–Ω–∏—Ö —Å—Ç–æ–ª—ñ–≤, —è–∫ —Ä–æ–±–æ—á–æ–≥–æ –º—ñ—Å—Ü—è,¬† –±—ñ–ª—å —É –ø–æ–ø–µ—Ä–µ–∫—É –∑–º–µ–Ω—à—É—î—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞ 32%.¬† –¢–∞–∫–æ–∂ —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–∞ –≤ –¥–∏–Ω–∞–º—ñ—á–Ω—ñ–π –ø–æ–∑—ñ –ø–æ–∫—Ä–∞—â—É—î —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç—É —Ä–µ–ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—ó —Ç–∞ —Å–µ—Ä—Ü–µ–≤–æ-—Å—É–¥–∏–Ω–Ω–æ—ó —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º. –ü—ñ–¥–π–æ–º–Ω–∏–π —Å—Ç—ñ–ª – –ø–µ—Ä—à –∑–∞ –≤—Å–µ –≤–∞—à –ø–æ–º—ñ—á–Ω–∏–∫ –≤ —Ç—É—Ä–±–æ—Ç—ñ –ø—Ä–æ –∑–¥–æ—Ä–æ–≤‚Äô—è. –°—Ç—ñ–ª –∑ –ø—ñ–¥–π–æ–º–Ω–∏–º –º–µ—Ö–∞–Ω—ñ–∑–º–æ–º ‚Äì —Ü–µ –≤–¥–æ—Å–∫–æ–Ω–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∏–π –∫–æ–º–ø‚Äô—é—Ç–µ—Ä–Ω–∏–π —Å—Ç—ñ–ª, –∑–∞ —è–∫–∏–º –∑—Ä—É—á–Ω–æ –ø—Ä–∞—Ü—é–≤–∞—Ç–∏ —è–∫ —Å–∏–¥—è—á–∏, —Ç–∞–∫ —ñ —Å—Ç–æ—è—á–∏. –ü—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞, –Ω–∞ –ø–µ—Ä—à–∏–π –ø–æ–≥–ª—è–¥, –∫–æ–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü—ñ—è, —â–æ –æ—Å–Ω–∞—â–µ–Ω–∞ –º–µ—Ö–∞–Ω—ñ–∑–º–æ–º –¥–ª—è –ø—ñ–¥–π–æ–º—É —Å—Ç—ñ–ª—å–Ω–∏—Ü—ñ¬† –±—É–≤–∞—î —Ä—ñ–∑–Ω–∏—Ö –≤–∞—Ä—ñ–∞–Ω—Ç—ñ–≤: –≤ –∑–∞–ª–µ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—ñ –≤—ñ–¥ –∫—ñ–ª—å–∫–æ—Å—Ç—ñ –æ–ø–æ—Ä (–≤—ñ–¥ 1 –¥–æ 4—Ö) —Ç–∞ –ø—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–Ω—è (–¥–ª—è —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–∏, –≥–µ–π–º–µ—Ä—Å—å–∫–∏–π, –¥–∏—Ç—è—á–∏–π, —Ä–æ–±–æ—á–∏–π —Ç–∞ —ñ–Ω).

–û–¥–Ω–µ –Ω–∞—Ç–∏—Å–∫–∞–Ω–Ω—è –Ω–∞ –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫—É ‚Äì —ñ —Ä–æ–±–æ—á–∞ –ø–æ–≤–µ—Ä—Ö–Ω—è —Å—Ç–æ–ª–∞ —Ä–∞–∑–æ–º –∑ —É—Å—ñ–º –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö—ñ–¥–Ω–∏–º –ø—ñ–¥–Ω—ñ–º–∞—î—Ç—å—Å—è.

–ú–æ–Ω—ñ—Ç–æ—Ä, –∫–ª–∞–≤—ñ–∞—Ç—É—Ä–∞ —ñ –º–∏—à–∫–∞ ‚Äì –≤—Å–µ –ø–æ–≤–∏–Ω–Ω–æ –±—É—Ç–∏ –∑—Ä—É—á–Ω–æ —Ä–æ–∑—Ç–∞—à–æ–≤–∞–Ω–æ –¥–ª—è —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–∏ –≤ –Ω–æ–≤–æ–º—É –ø–æ–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—ñ:

  • –º–æ–Ω—ñ—Ç–æ—Ä ‚Äì –Ω–∞ —Ä—ñ–≤–Ω—ñ –æ—á–µ–π;
  • –∫–ª–∞–≤—ñ–∞—Ç—É—Ä–∞ ‚Äì –Ω–∞ —Ä—ñ–≤–Ω—ñ –ª—ñ–∫—Ç—ñ–≤, –∞ –ª—ñ–∫—Ç—ñ –ø–æ–≤–∏–Ω–Ω—ñ –ª–µ–∂–∞—Ç–∏ –Ω–∞ —Å—Ç—ñ–ª—å–Ω–∏—Ü—ñ –ø—ñ–¥ –∫—É—Ç–æ–º 90 –≥—Ä–∞–¥—É—Å—ñ–≤.

–ü—ñ–¥–π–æ–º–Ω–∏–π —Å—Ç—ñ–ª –≤–∏—è–≤–∏–≤—Å—è –ø–æ–ø—É–ª—è—Ä–Ω–∏–º —Å–µ—Ä–µ–¥ –æ—Ñ—ñ—Å–Ω–∏—Ö —Å–ª—É–∂–±–æ–≤—Ü—ñ–≤ —Ç–∞ —Ñ—Ä—ñ–ª–∞–Ω—Å–µ—Ä—ñ–≤ —Ç–æ–º—É, —â–æ –≤—ñ–Ω –∑—Ä—É—á–Ω–∏–π —ñ –¥–æ–ø–æ–º–∞–≥–∞—î –Ω–∞–≤—ñ—Ç—å –Ω–∞ —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç—ñ –ø—ñ–∫–ª—É–≤–∞—Ç–∏—Å—è –ø—Ä–æ –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—É —Ç–∞ –∑–¥–æ—Ä–æ–≤‚Äô—è.

–ß–∏–º –∫–æ—Ä–∏—Å–Ω–∏–π –∫–æ–º–ø‚Äô—é—Ç–µ—Ä–Ω–∏–π —Å—Ç—ñ–ª –∑ —Ä–µ–≥—É–ª—é–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—è–º –≤–∏—Å–æ—Ç–∏

–°—Ç–æ–ª–∏ –∑ —Ä–µ–≥—É–ª—å–æ–≤–∞–Ω–æ—é –≤–∏—Å–æ—Ç–æ—é –∑‚Äô—è–≤–∏–ª–∏—Å—è –∑ —ñ–¥–µ—ó –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ—ñ–ª–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–∏ –∑–∞—Ö–≤–æ—Ä—é–≤–∞–Ω—å —É –ª—é–¥–µ–π, —è–∫—ñ –ø—Ä–∞—Ü—é—é—Ç—å —Å–∏–¥—è—á–∏ –±–∞–≥–∞—Ç–æ —á–∞—Å—É.
–í–∏–Ω–∞—Ö—ñ–¥ —É—Å–ø—ñ—à–Ω–æ –≤–∏—Ä—ñ—à–∏–≤ –ø–∏—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—è –∫–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω–æ—ó —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–∏ —Å—Ç–æ—è—á–∏ ‚Äì –¥–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è—î –º—ñ–Ω—è—Ç–∏ –ø–æ–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—è —Å–∏–¥—è—á–∏/—Å—Ç–æ—è—á–∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ç—è–≥–æ–º —Ä–æ–±–æ—á–æ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è. –Ü–¥–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ —á–µ—Ä–≥—É–≤–∞—Ç–∏ –ø–æ–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—è —Ç—ñ–ª–∞ –∫–æ–∂–Ω—ñ 40-45 —Ö–≤–∏–ª–∏–Ω.
–î–ª—è —Ä–æ–∑—Ä–æ–±–∫–∏ –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω–∏—Ö –ø–∞—Ä–∞–º–µ—Ç—Ä—ñ–≤ –∫–æ–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü—ñ—ó —Å—Ç–æ–ª—ñ–≤ –º–∏ –ø–æ—Å—Ç—ñ–π–Ω–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Å—É–ª—å—Ç—É—î–º–æ—Å—è –∑ –ø—Ä–æ–≤—ñ–¥–Ω–∏–º–∏ –ª—ñ–∫–∞—Ä—è–º–∏:¬† –æ—Ä—Ç–æ–ø–µ–¥–æ–º, –Ω–µ–π—Ä–æ—Ö—ñ—Ä—É—Ä–≥–æ–º, —Ñ–ª–µ–±–æ–ª–æ–≥–æ–º, –≤–µ—Ä—Ç–µ–±—Ä–æ–ª–æ–≥–æ–º —Ç–∞ —É—Ä–æ–ª–æ–≥–æ–º.¬†

–Ø–∫ —Å—Ç—ñ–ª –∑ —Ä–µ–≥—É–ª—é–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—è–º –≤–∏—Å–æ—Ç–∏ –≤–ø–ª–∏–≤–∞—î –Ω–∞ –∑–¥–æ—Ä–æ–≤‚Äô—è:

  1. –ù–∞–≤–∞–Ω—Ç–∞–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—è –Ω–∞ —Ö—Ä–µ–±–µ—Ç –Ω–∞ 40% –Ω–∏–∂—á–µ —É –ø–æ–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—ñ —Å—Ç–æ—è—á–∏ –Ω—ñ–∂ –≤ –ø–æ–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—ñ —Å–∏–¥—è—á–∏. –í–∂–µ –ø—ñ—Å–ª—è –¥–µ–∫—ñ–ª—å–∫–æ—Ö —Ç–∏–∂–Ω—ñ–≤ —É 32% –≤–∏–ø–∞–¥–∫—ñ–≤ –ø–æ–∫—Ä–∞—â—É—î—Ç—å—Å—è —Å—Ç–∞–Ω —Ö—Ä–µ–±—Ç–∞ —Ç–∞ –∑–Ω–∏–∂—É—é—Ç—å—Å—è –∞–±–æ –ø—Ä–æ—Ö–æ–¥—è—Ç—å –±–æ–ª—ñ —É –ø–æ–ø–µ—Ä–µ–∫—É. –©–µ –æ–¥–Ω–µ –¥–æ—Å–ª—ñ–¥–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—è CDC –ø–æ–∫–∞–∑—É—î, —â–æ –≤–∂–µ –ø—ñ—Å–ª—è 4-—Ö —Ç–∏–∂–Ω—ñ–≤ —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–∏ –≤ –¥–∏–Ω–∞–º—ñ—á–Ω—ñ–π –ø–æ–∑—ñ¬† 54% –∫–æ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç—É–≤–∞—á—ñ–≤ –ø–æ–∑–±—É–ª–∏—Å—è –±–æ–ª—é —É –≤–µ—Ä—Ö–Ω—ñ–π —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–Ω—ñ —Å–ø–∏–Ω–∏ —Ç–∞ —à–∏–π–Ω–æ–º—É –≤—ñ–¥–¥—ñ–ª—ñ.¬†
  2. –ó–∞–≤–¥—è–∫–∏ –µ—Ä–≥–æ–Ω–æ–º—ñ—á–Ω—ñ–π —Å—Ç—ñ–ª—å–Ω–∏—Ü—ñ –∑–º–µ–Ω—à—É—î—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞–≤–∞–Ω—Ç–∞–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—è –Ω–∞ —à–∏–π–Ω–∏–π –≤—ñ–¥–¥—ñ–ª —Ç–∞ –≤–µ—Ä—Ö–Ω—é —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–Ω—É —Å–ø–∏–Ω–∏ (—Ç—Ä–∞–ø–µ—Ü—ñ—î–≤–∏–¥–Ω–∏–π –º‚Äô—è–∑).¬†
  3. –ï—Ñ–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ñ—Å—Ç—å –≤–∞—à–æ—ó —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–∏ –∑—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞—î –≤ —Å–µ—Ä–µ–¥–Ω—å–æ–º—É –Ω–∞ 30%, –∑–≥—ñ–¥–Ω–æ –¥–æ—Å–ª—ñ–¥–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—è–º –¥–∞—Ç—Å—å–∫–æ—ó —Ñ—ñ—Ä–º–∏ –∑ –ø–æ–≤–µ–¥—ñ–Ω–∫–æ–≤–æ–≥–æ –¥–∏–∑–∞–π–Ω—É.¬†
  4. –ü–æ–∫—Ä–∞—â—É—î—Ç—å—Å—è —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–∞ —Ä–µ–ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—ó —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∏.¬†

–í–∏–º–æ–≥–∏ –¥–æ –≤–∞–Ω—Ç–∞–∂–æ–ø—ñ–¥–π–æ–º–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—ñ —Å—Ç–æ–ª—É –∑–∞–ª–µ–∂–∏—Ç—å –≤—ñ–¥ –∫—ñ–ª—å–∫–æ—Å—Ç—ñ –≤–∏–∫–æ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–æ–≤—É–≤–∞–Ω–∏—Ö –≤–∞–º–∏ –¥–µ–≤–∞–π—Å—ñ–≤. –Ø–∫—â–æ –≤–∏ –∫–æ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç—É—î—Ç–µ—Å—è —Ç—ñ–ª—å–∫–∏ –Ω–æ—É—Ç–±—É–∫–æ–º —ñ –±—ñ–ª—å—à–µ –Ω—ñ—á–æ–≥–æ –Ω–µ –ø–ª–∞–Ω—É—î—Ç–µ, –≤–∞–º –ø—ñ–¥—ñ–π–¥–µ –≤–∞–Ω—Ç–∞–∂–æ–ø—ñ–¥–π–æ–º–Ω—ñ—Å—Ç—å 25 –∫–≥. –≤ –¥–∏–Ω–∞–º—ñ—Ü—ñ. –Ø–∫—â–æ –∂ —É –≤–∞—Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω–∏–π –±–ª–æ–∫, –¥–≤–∞ –∞–±–æ –±—ñ–ª—å—à–µ –º–æ–Ω—ñ—Ç–æ—Ä—ñ–≤ —Ç–∞ —ñ–Ω—à–∞ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω—ñ–∫–∞, —Ç–æ –∫—Ä–∞—â–µ –≤–∏–±–∏—Ä–∞—Ç–∏ —Å—Ç–æ–ª–∏ –∑ –≤–∞–Ω—Ç–∞–∂–æ–ø—ñ–¥–π–æ–º–Ω—ñ—Å—Ç—é –≤—ñ–¥ 70 –∫–≥.

–Ü –≥–æ–ª–æ–≤–Ω–µ, –ø—Ä–∏ —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç—ñ –≤ –¥–∏–Ω–∞–º—ñ—á–Ω—ñ–π –ø–æ–∑—ñ —Å–∏–¥—è—á–∏ / —Å—Ç–æ—è—á–∏ –≤–∞—à–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ñ—Å—Ç—å –∑—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–µ, –≤ —Å–µ—Ä–µ–¥–Ω—å–æ–º—É, –Ω–∞ 30%. –ü–æ – –ø–µ—Ä—à–µ – —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ —Ç–µ, —â–æ –ø–æ–∑–∞ —Å—Ç–æ—è—á–∏ – —Ü–µ —Å–∏–ª—å–Ω–∞ –ø–æ–∑–∞, –ø–æ–∑–∞ –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–∏—Ö –¥—ñ–π, –ø–æ-–¥—Ä—É–≥–µ – –≤ –ø–æ–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—ñ —Å—Ç–æ—è—á–∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–∞—Ü—ñ—è –≤–∏—â–µ —ñ –º–µ–Ω—à–µ –ø—Ä–æ–∫—Ä–∞—Å—Ç–∏–Ω–∞—Ü—ñ—ó.

acf.seo_text:
According to a study*, after only 2 weeks of using lifting desks as workstations, lower back pain is reduced by 32%.¬† Also, working in a dynamic position improves the functioning of the reproductive and cardiovascular systems. A lifting desk is, first of all, your helper as you work to improve your health. A desk with a lifting mechanism is an advanced computer desk where a worker is comfortable both while sitting and standing. Having a superficially simple design, it is equipped with a mechanism for lifting the tabletop and comes in various types, depending on the number of supports (from 1 to 4) and purpose (office work, gaming, for kids, manual work, etc.).

* Impact of a Sit-Stand Workstation on Chronic Low Back Pain: Results of a Randomized Trial Grant T Ognibene, Wilson Torres, Rie von Eyben, Kathleen C Horst

Have you decided to work in a dynamic position?

One push of a button – and the working surface of the desk rises together with everything you need.
Monitor, keyboard and mouse ‚Äì everything should be conveniently located for working in a new position:

  • the monitor should be at eye level;
  • the keyboard should be at elbow level, and the elbows should lie on the tabletop at an angle of 90 degrees.

The lifting desk has become popular among office workers and freelancers because it is comfortable and helps them to take care of posture and health even at work.

Benefits of an adjustable height computer desk

Adjustable height desks were invented to prevent diseases in people who work while sitting down for a long time.
The invention successfully solved the issue of comfortable standing work ‚Äì it allows the user to alternate sitting and standing positions during the working day. Changing body position every 40-45 minutes is ideal.
In order to develop the optimal design parameters for our desks, we constantly consult with leading doctors: an orthopedist, a neurosurgeon, a phlebologist, a vertebrologist, and a urologist.¬†

¬†Health impact of an adjustable height computer desk:

  1. The load on the spine is 40% lower in the standing position than in the sitting one. Already after a few weeks, the condition of the spine improves and lower back pain decreases or vanishes in 32% of cases. Another CDC study shows that after just 4 weeks of working in a dynamic position, 54% of users became free of upper back and neck pain.¬†
  2. Thanks to an ergonomic tabletop, the load on the neck and upper back (trapezius muscle) is reduced.¬†
  3. Your work efficiency increases by an average of 30%, according to a study by a Danish behavioural design firm.¬†
  4. The reproductive system starts functioning better.¬†
  5. The risk of excessive weight gain decreases. By working while standing for 15 minutes of each hour, you additionally lose about 20,000 calories per year (with 40 working hours per week), which is equivalent to participating in 6 marathons.¬†
  6. The cardiovascular system starts functioning better. A sedentary lifestyle increases the risk of cardiovascular disease by 147%¬†¬†
  7. The stress level decreases. In ‚Äústrong positions‚Äù, the body produces more testosterone and less cortisol, which aids one’s mental and emotional activity.¬†
  8. It helps to get rid of hyperirritability. By alternating sitting and standing work with the help of an adjustable height desk, you reduce the load on the connective tissue of the gluteal muscles, which in turn helps to avoid stress areas emerging in the body.¬†
  9. Working in a dynamic position can reduce the risk of kidney disease by 30%.
  10. Decreasing blood sugar level. Studies show that when alternating body positions every 30-40 minutes, the sugar level decreases by an average of 11.1%.¬†

Take care of your health ‚Äì work in a dynamic position!

Desk with an electric drive: easy to control, made for efficient work

TEHNOTABLE desks are designed with comfort in mind. A desk equipped with an electric drive is recognised as the most comfortable. When manufacturing a lifting desk, we take into account your wishes regarding the design and materials of the tabletop for complete comfort.

Desks with electronic height adjustment are equipped with:

  • a stable and sturdy frame with an electric motor;
  • a tabletop with an ergonomic cut out;
  • a control panel;
  • an electric extension cords

In addition, the lifting desk may be equipped at your discretion with:

  • an adjustable stand for one or two monitors;
  • a wireless charger;
  • a beverage warmer;
  • a network filter;
  • lighting;
  • bar counter and much more)¬†

An adjustable height desk offers several advantages:

  • It transforms smoothly and quickly: the tabletop can be lifted by 45 cm in just 20 seconds.
  • You can easily adjust the height of the desk to suit your height. There is no need to get up, bend down and look for a lever, as, for example, with gas lift-equipped desks, or turn a handle to raise the tabletop. 4-button panel simplifies controlling.
  • The motor and lifting mechanisms work quietly (noise level is below 40dB).
  • It is convenient: you can work both sitting and standing.
  • It is comfortable. Thanks to the ergonomic cut out, you can put your elbows on the desk and work comfortably (in accordance with ISO 9241-5: 1998 ‚Äì Ergonomic Requirements for Office Work with Video Display Terminals).
  • It is reliable and stable: the tabletop is wide and you can lean on the edge of the desk while standing.
  • You can store in the memory of the control system 4 height positions of the working surface at which you find work comfortable.

Desks with electric height adjustment are equipped with:

  • stable and durable frame with an electric motor;
  • top with an ergonomic incurvation;
  • remote control;
  • electric extension cord.

As an option, a height adjustable desk can be equipped with:

  • an adjustable stand for one or two monitors;
  • wireless charger;
  • beverage warmer;
  • surge protector.

A height adjustable desk has several advantages:

  • Smooth and quick transformation: the top raises up by 45 cm in 20 seconds.
  • You can easily adjust the height of the desk to fit your height. There is no need to get up, bend down and look for a lever, as, for example, in case of the desks with a gas lift, or turn the knob to raise the countertop. A panel with 4 buttons simplifies control.
  • The motor and lifting mechanisms operate quietly (noise level up to 40dB)
  • It‚Äôs practical: you can work in two positions ‚Äì sitting and standing up.
  • Comfortable. Thanks to the ergonomic incurvation in the middle, you can put your elbows on the desk and work comfortably (in accordance with ISO 9241-5:1998 ‚Äì ‚ÄúErgonomic requirements for office work with visual display terminals‚Äù)
  • Reliable and stable: the top is large and, you can freely lean on the edge of the desk while standing up.
  • You can save in the memory of the control system 4 positions of the height, at which you are comfortable to work.

acf.seo_title: How to choose ergonomic chairs wich you can spend eternity
acf.seo_text:
80 years ago, Swedish hygienist Bent Akerblom proved that working long hours sitting on traditional chairs is inconvenient and unhealthy. He improved the shapes and lines of the backrest and seat of the chairs so that they correspond to the maximum anatomical and physiological characteristics of the person.

‚ÄãAkerblom‚Äôs drawings and calculations are actively used in the production of modern furniture. On the back began to bend and support for the waist (the so-called Akerblom line), and the seats tilt. Due to the fact that the spine takes a natural S-shaped position when sitting, the load on the bones and muscles becomes minimal and the person feels quite comfortable on the chair.

Such chairs and chairs are called ergonomic. They are optimally adapted to human biomechanics, are suitable for long-term use and provide proper working conditions for a person in a sitting position.

Ergonomic chair increases performance

The fact is that a special computer chair can improve the emotional and physical state of a person, and most importantly,¬†it increases performance by more than 50%.
Do you spend over a third of a day sitting at your computer? An ergonomic chair is a necessary element of your comfortable workplace. The ergonomic chair combines the best features of orthopedic and anatomical models and has unique features.

¬†Benefits of a seat:

  • Convenient and comfortable, designed for long work.
  • You can customize your settings and needs.
  • It has an anatomically correct back that repeats the contour of the human body. This allows you to distribute the body weight over the entire surface of the back and relieve the load from the spine. Adjust posture of thoracic spine.
  • Equipped with adjustable lumbar support and individual adjustment mechanisms.
  • It has a flexible vertical support and a tilt mechanism, thus controlling the posture and reducing the load on the coccyx.
  • Meets European ergonomics standards.
  • Helps prevent problems with the musculoskeletal system. After a long sitting on an uncomfortable office chair can lead to back pain, posture, muscle swelling, osteochondrosis.

From creative to functional: a variety of ergonomic chairs

We have models of chairs from three brands from Italy, America and Austria. These companies are recognized in the world as the best manufacturers of home and office furniture with extensive experience and innovative approach.

¬†10 Tips for choosing an ergonomic chair:

  1. Choose personally.¬†The characteristics of the chair must match your parameters: height, weight, features of the figure. Yes, the ergonomic chair Herman Miller Aeron Remastered comes in three sizes. Suitable for teens 147 cm tall, or tall people up to 198 cm. And will withstand loads up to 159 kg.
  2. Measure without haste.¬†Personally, you should be comfortable sitting in the seat for more than 20 minutes.
  3. Choose the style of work¬†and focus on the functionality of the chair and adjustment.¬†Some models ergonomic chair, have more than 7 functions and can be adjusted using buttons or levers.
  4. The backrest should be adjusted in height, depth, inclination, have an ergonomic bend.¬†Some models are additionally fitted with a roller underneath, or, like the Wiesner-Hager Paro_2 ergonomic armchair, immediately fitted with a high back with a mesh that repeats the shape of the spine. This allows you to comfortably position the lumbar department. By the way, the Vienna Opera is equipped with chairs Wiesner Hager.
  5. Choose a chair that will allow you to lower or raise the seat¬†for a comfortable position:¬†your feet should touch the floor.
  6. Try how the armrests are adjusted.¬†It is important that your hands are close to your desk.
  7. Check the stability of the chair. The larger the cross and the number of wheels, the stronger the chair will stand on the floor.
  8. Pay attention to the material¬†of the frame, armrests, backrest and seat.¬†It can be metal, plastic, mesh. For upholstery use: fabric, eco leather.
  9. Make sure that you have mobility on the floor, which is provided with armchairs that are flat and rubberized.¬†For a soft coating such as carpet, it is best to choose a chair with rigid plastic rollers; and for laminate and parquet ‚Äì soft rubberized.
  10. Additional options are required: head restraints, foot rest, and more. The use of a head restraint reduces tension on the cervical spine.

And finally, you should like the ergonomic chair design and design.

Choose a chair where you will be comfortable sitting and inspiring for a long time.

By the way, sitting in a computer chair can perform some exercises from the workout to stretch the spine, straighten the posture, lift the load from the muscles.

The key to effective work and at the same time taking care of one‚Äôs health is a successful combination of a computer desk with height adjustment and an ergonomic chair.

Thanks to a wide selection of various additional options and devices, such as a wireless charger, a block of sockets in the tabletop, cable management for wires, a bracket for monitors, a bar in the tabletop and many others, you can choose and independently create new ideas and solutions for your work places Each of us is an individual and we have individual needs. Create your ideal workspace for productive work.

RAISE THE FUNCTIONALITY OF YOUR DESKTOP TO A WHOLE NEW LEVEL!

We’re all about customization, because your desktop should be your partner, helping and taking care of you. That is why we are happy to solve any request, even a completely unusual one. Thanks to additional options, you will have everything you need at hand, while optimizing the space at home.

CONCERNED ABOUT YOU.

Ergonomic devices help take care of comfort and functionality, as well as support and improve your physical condition. Thanks to a board for active standing or a balancer, the circulation of blood and lymph in the lower limbs improves, the metabolism starts, you physically move – which is equal to a small warm-up. Using a footrest, you improve blood circulation in the pelvis and lower limbs, act on acupuncture points on the feet. The support of the hand and forearm allows you to correctly place the hands on the table and relieve the load from the shoulder joint, prevent the development of tunnel syndrome.

acf.seo_text:
Acoustic office booths and partitions ‚Äì modern solutions for excessive noise in offices. They will help you to concentrate better and solve everyday problems more effectively, to negotiate, to conclude important agreements. Studies show that modern office workers have a high level of stress and suffer from excessive noise, as it is the main disadvantage of working in open-space. Employees spend about 20% of the working day trying to focus on the task at hand.

Therefore, more and more modern companies use soundproof office booths, which help to solve the problem of zoning the workspace and create a comfortable workplace or a place for private negotiations, without redesigning the entire office.

  10. –£–º–µ–Ω—å—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω—è —Å–∞—Ö–∞—Ä–∞. –ò—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –ø–æ–∫–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞—é—Ç, —á—Ç–æ –ø—Ä–∏ —á–µ—Ä–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –ø–æ–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ç–µ–ª–∞ –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–µ 30-40 –º–∏–Ω—É—Ç —É—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å —Å–∞—Ö–∞—Ä–∞ —É–º–µ–Ω—å—à–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –≤ —Å—Ä–µ–¥–Ω–µ–º –Ω–∞ 11,1%.
